Reviews.Title: Decent Bargain Level Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Joseph "jck09"

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_moJUV4U8SK44X9currentClick) { return cv_moJUV4U8SK44X9currentClick(); } } } Length:: 6:24 MinsI thought the Simban S74W 7" tablet is a good choice for entry users at its price. If you want to play some android games, do websurfing, email, social media, and maybe watch videos, this is very good. If you're buying it primarily as a e-book reader, I wouldn't recommend it, and if want the best possible speed or graphics, or want to do school or office work, you'll need something pricier, but this is a very good choice for an extra tablet to keep around the house for web browsing or to keep your kids off your own tablet.Design: I'm surprised how much I like the functionality of the design. It's basically a plastic shell with front and back cameras, a home button, and a series of ports. The ports are quite functional - a probe power port, an microsd card slot, a 3.5 mm earphone jack, and a full size and mini usb ports. I particularly appreciate that the Simban can charge through EITHER the probe power port or the mini usb port, which means I charge it with the variety of mini USB plugs I have laying around. 4/5Connectivity: It has wi-fi at the 2.4 gHz band, but no cell, gps, bluetooth, 5.0 wifi, etc. That's enough to make it useful in a wifi enabled area, but be aware that you won't be able to use bluetooth accessories, only wireline ones. It does make up for what somewhat with its wide variety of ports. 3/5Screen: The 800 x 480 screen is good but not great, even at the relatively small size. Watching anime on netflix was a little blocky, although movies and tv shows looked pretty good for the 7" size, and reading books on Kindle was a little blurrier than I'm used to. If I were buying this primarily as an ebook reader or a platform to watch TV, I think I'd prefer to save up and buy a model with a 1200x800 screen, but this is great for games, web browsing, video chat, and is acceptable for occasional forays into literature or television. 3/5App Compatibility: I ran it with a bunch of my favorite apps, and the dual core seemed to handle almost all of them like a champ. Games like Hungry Shark or Angry Birds take several seconds to load, but then ran great, as did Netflix, Youtube, Kindle, Skype, chrome, the built-in mail program, myfitnesspal, etc. Oddly, the only problems I had were with TVGuide, which crashed on opening, and Google Drive, which I couldn't install. 3/5.Overall, as I said, I think this is pretty good for what you pay. If you want a platform for some basic surfing, videos and games, this is decent, as long as you appreciate that it won't run some apps. Recommended for an entry level or backup tablet.Note: I received a review unit in return for an honest review.

Reviews.Title: A great tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: elizabeth
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for Easter coming up. It arrived a day early in good packaging. I've put his learning apps and some of his favorite songs on it so it will be ready for him when he opens it. It is a great tablet for the price. This tablet is really nice. I would recommend this tablet to anyone. The battery life i cannot give a review on right now, but i will update this as my son uses it.

Reviews.Title: A great tablet
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Cowen
Reviews.Content: Simbans S74W 7 Inch Tablet PC by Simbans is a nice little tablet for the money. This tablet has a beautiful display (7") and displays images at 800x480 resolution. Text looks sharper, colors are more vivid, and games stand out. It comes with 512MB DDR2 ram memory and a 4 GB NAND FLASH hard drive for Storage. The camera comes with a rear webcam with Resolution 1 MP resolution. This tablet will not do as much as a Kindle HD Fire but it is perfect for simple application and games. I think this laptop would be great to use to play games or watch movies on.  I would definitely recommend this tablet.I have listed some more specifications that I considered important for this tablet. They are as follows:* Operating System - Android 4.1 Jelly Bean* Display - 7-Inch Display* Processor - A20 Dual core 1.2 Ghtz* Memory - 512MB DDR2 ram memory, 4 GB NAND FLASH* Number of USB 2.0 Ports - 1* Video Recording* Wi-Fi (802.11 b/g/n)Thank you for reading my review, if you have any questions feel free to email me, I would be happy to help you with any questions you have.I was supplied a sample for test and evaluation.

Reviews.Title: Great product, Great price!
Reviews.Author: shopAholic
Reviews.Content: Purchased 2 las month for my daughters birthdays 6yrs & 11yrs old. They absolutely LoVe it!!!! These tablets great for the price, my co-worker jus placed an order ystrday for her 2 granddaughters. Pictures aren't great bu I highly recommend :)

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: This tablet was a great buy..for the price and performance..better than tablets twice the price.The rating posted with a video  made the purchase a lot easier. .I would recommend  it..purchased as a gift

Reviews.Title: quite happy with product for the price
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for a birthday gift and tested it for few days just to make sure it works as I had a bad experience with another one from a different seller. I must say I am very pleased with this tablet.It is faster than the one I bought earlier; Wifi connectivity seems pretty good; I was able to download few games without any issue; skype works too. have not tried netflixFew things that could have been got better: screen resolution is bit lower and camera picture quality is not very highbut hey I am not complaining because you could not ask for more from a $70 tablet. I am sure the kid is going to love this.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tablet fan
Reviews.Content: This tablet is good, if you are not downloading games that require a lot of memory. My son could not play Angry Birds Go! on it.Also the charger broke almost right away. The part that connects from the charger to the tablet is what broke.Besides that the table works pretty good, if you do not need many apps.

Reviews.Title: does not stay on.
Reviews.Author: Mom
Reviews.Content: Would not stay on when I opened an app. Would stay on if I did not do anything but the battery would quickly die it went from 97% to 32% in 10 minutes! I promptly returned it. Fast return.

Reviews.Title: For the kids
Reviews.Author: timetoread
Reviews.Content: Got this a couple of weeks ago.  Bought it strictly for the grandkids to play games.  Wish I had paid more attention to the storage on it!.  I have put a few games on it and it is already full.  So I guess we will be taking them off back and forth.  Not what I had in mind but it should work.  Have not tried any of the features other than adding the games.  So far my 4 year old grandson has played with it, this weekend my 9 year old granddaughter will get her chance to try it out.
